Jan 17, 2003

Palestinians have no access to medical care!

“After 36 years of Israeli occupation, in the territories there isn’t a single medical center worthy of the name, and the road to medical treatment in Israel is now almost completely closed. A visit to a medical clinic in Israel? You need an entry permit. Complicated surgery? Lengthy treatment? There’s no one to pay for it.” Ha’aretz
